p: Knockdown of endogenous TRIM25 in chicken LMH cells (hepatocellular carcinoma cell line), seeded in 24-well plates, was achieved by transfection of a siRNA specific for chTRIM25 5′-GCGAGAUUUGCUGAGAGCUGAGUUU-3′ (Invitrogen). As control, LMH cells were transfected with a non-targeting control sequence 5′-AAGGACGCUGAGGCCUAAUCCUGUU-3′ (Invitrogen).
